target_markets.market_description: Web3 entrepreneurs and developers exploring new design surfaces
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Described as 'totally unexplored design surface' comparable to 2005 REST APIs era
Many portfolio startups using the service

problems_validated.problem: Startup employees with equity in overvalued companies face worthless options
problems_validated.severity: High - equity could be worth nothing
problems_validated.market_gap: Private markets lack mark-to-market functionality unlike public markets

problems_validated.problem: Market panic despite common investment wisdom
problems_validated.current_solutions: Warren Buffett quotes about being greedy when others are fearful
problems_validated.market_gap: People don't follow their own advice during actual fearful periods

products_tools.name: Marketer Hire
products_tools.use_case: Marketplace for on-demand marketing talent with proprietary matching technology
products_tools.pricing: zero risk, don't pay unless you choose to work with someone

products_tools.name: Robinhood
products_tools.pricing: market cap 8.6 billion, 6 billion cash on hand
products_tools.metrics: 20+ million customers, laying off 9% of workforce

business_strategies.strategy: Dollar cost averaging into S&P 500 every Monday
business_strategies.implementation: Consistent weekly purchases regardless of market conditions
business_strategies.expected_results: Long-term wealth building with S&P 500 as biggest position

business_strategies.strategy: Buying growth stocks during market downturns
business_strategies.implementation: Purchase tech-forward names when they're 40-50% off highs

problems_solutions.problem: Private market equity valuation uncertainty during downturns
problems_solutions.solution: Understand that private markets don't have mark-to-market like public markets
steps: Recognize equity issued at recent high valuations may be underwater
Plan for potential worthlessness if exercise window is only 90 days

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Joining startups valued over $100M with 90-day option exercise windows
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Equity could be worth nothing due to overvaluation
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Understand private market dynamics and valuation timing
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Series B/C startups that raised at peak valuations

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Panicking during market downturns despite knowing investment wisdom
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing buying opportunities when assets are discounted
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Stick to systematic investment approach regardless of market sentiment
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People tweeting Warren Buffett quotes but panicking when markets actually drop

metrics_kpis.metric: Market cap to enterprise value ratio
metrics_kpis.benchmark: Robinhood example: 8.6B market cap, ~3B enterprise value after cash
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Market cap minus cash on hand
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Look for companies with strong cash positions during downturns

trends_signals.trend: Web3 as unexplored design surface comparable to 2005 REST APIs era
trends_signals.opportunity: Learning about governance, DAOs, and token design in real-time

trends_signals.trend: Growth stocks down 40-50% from highs creating buying opportunities
trends_signals.opportunity: Potential for significant returns when markets recover

trends_signals.trend: Fed likely to reverse course on rate hikes if Q2 shows negative growth
trends_signals.opportunity: Growth stocks could 'rip like never seen before' if Fed pivots

actionable_quotes.quote: be fearful when others are greedy and greedy when others are fearful
actionable_quotes.context: Warren Buffett investment wisdom that people quote but don't follow
actionable_quotes.actionability: Actually implement contrarian investing during market fear

actionable_quotes.quote: if the startup you're working for is valued at more than 100 million dollars and the exercise window on your options is 90 days you should pencil in that your equity will be worth nothing
actionable_quotes.context: Advice about startup equity during market downturns
actionable_quotes.actionability: Evaluate startup equity opportunities more carefully

key_statistics.context: Due to duplicate functions during market downturn

key_statistics.statistic: Growth stocks down 40-50% from their highs
key_statistics.context: Current market conditions creating buying opportunities
